forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: teleporting within area

comments.text: you can use a script to teleport people from one position to another within your area.
first, create a marker for the target. just use "create thing" and give it a distinct name, like "target1", and save.
then on the other side of the area, add a creation with a script like "when touched then send nearby onto target1" ("touched" could be any other event, too).
you can also make your target marker invisible. context-laser the thing part during editing, click "...", and set "Invisible when done".

thread.latestCommentText: you can also make your target marker invisible. context-laser the thing part during editing, click "...", and set "Invisible when done"
